body_html: @apaszke Sampler captures the strategy, the parameters are provided at the constructor. Resetting it to point to a different size data set is what we need. This will allow us to support large data file for which the size is not known at the beginning. We can use hierarchical sampling by reading data parts by parts and applying the sampler. For epochs, it is the same strategy, the samples will be different between epochs, but not sure why we need to create a new Sampler for it.
